metadata.synopsis: This dialogue takes place after the player has successfully fought back an army of goblins that attacked the druid grove. Aelar is still in a bit of a daze from chanting for so long. He doesn't quite believe everything that's happened.

0.speaker: Aelar
0.text: None of this feels real. Not yet.
0.context: NodeContext: So much has happened in such a short time - infighting among the druids, her first druid disappearing, goblins attacking the grove - it's all a bit surreal.

1.speaker: Aelar
1.text: Goblins at our gates... you spared us a nightmare.
1.context: NodeContext: Player has just defeated a horde of goblins that attacked the grove.
